title: New year, new home! You'll love living here.
description: New year, new home!  Make this lovely home in popular Meriweather Farms yours! You'll love living here.  From the front door, there is gleaming hardwood flooring throughout the first floor.  There's a lovely open floor plan that flows from the living room to the dining room and kitchen, where there is a lovely center island.  Newer sliding glass doors lead to a nice-sized deck. The cozy family room is steps away and this model has two added features!  There's an office off of the driveway with its own entrance as well as an exercise room.  Both of these rooms are flexible and can be whatever you choose them to be, home office, guest or in-law bedroom, au pair situation, you name it! There is a powder room on this level and a utility room that includes a washer and dryer and an outside entrance to a patio in the back! On the upper level, there is a lovely updated hall bath, the main spacious bedroom, and two additional bedrooms with ceiling fans.  The main bedroom, one other bedroom, stairs, and hall have newer carpeting.  This lovely home is within walking distance of both the middle and high schools! West Goshen is a lovely township with a wonderful park, convenient to 202, and a great shopping center.  From 202 you can head up to King of Prussia Mall or down to Delaware.  You are also minutes from all the wonderful restaurants and shops in charming West Chester Borough.  There is a very large shed off of the driveway for all the storage needs you may have! It measures 20 x 11'8".

title: Renovated Studio Apt Home on Rittenhouse Square, Near Grocery Stores
description:
The unfurnished studio apartment home at 2510 is available for lease at this moment! This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home on the 25th floor features large windows that face south and have a Chancellor Street view including a peak of South Philadelphia in between high-rise buildings. We plan to renovate this particular home. Be the first to enjoy new renovations! This renovated kitchen will be nice with its white cabinets and granite counters. This kitchen will be fully-equipped with a gas stove, microwave, disposal, and dishwasher. This home will have wood floors. Move into your new home as early as February 15, 2023!
All utilities, except for cable and internet, are included. You have your choice of cable and/or internet provider.
Our amenities are amazing! This community offers a sauna, package room, lounge, fitness center, fitness/yoga studio, dog spa, guest suites, and bicycle storage. Lounge 201 includes a pool table, media room, printer/copier, conference room, demonstration kitchen, dining area, and cozy seating areas. Plus, we are renovating our roof deck! There is a front door attendant and a front desk concierge. In this building, there is a laundry room on every floor. Plus, you may do multiple loads of laundry at the same time in our large laundry facility on the third floor. We have an attached parking garage! Please note that this valet parking garage is not managed by this community, so the monthly parking fee is separate.
This building has such a convenient location! Nearby grocery stores and food markets are Trader Joe's, Giant, Rittenhouse Market, Aldi, Giant Heirloom Market, Aldi, Acme, Whole Foods, Spruce Food Market, Sue's Produce Market, Venditore by Giordano, Di Bruno Bros., and the Reading Terminal Market. There are a couple of Fine Wine & Good Spirits locations nearby. Shop at retail shops on Rittenhouse Row like Anthropologie, Lovesac, and L'Occitane en Provence. Dine out at the restaurants on the block: Rouge, Devon, and Parc. Indulge in a weekend brunch at Green Eggs! Savor a cappuccino at La Colombe, Bottega Rittenhouse, and Elixr. Relax in the park at Rittenhouse Square.
